item.title: Linear Feedback Shift Register : C++ implementation
item.description: Linear Feedback Shift Registers (LFSR) arises in many applications, especially in communications. See wiki page for a good introduction http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linear_feedback_shift_register. We implemented LFSR in C++ which can be found here https://ee717-iitb.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/A5-1/ . You can download this code by using svn. If you are not aware of svn then you can simply download these files manually. This is a make file project. After having all these files in a directory; command make all should build it.
